titleInfo.title: Big WLAC radio show featuring Judy Derryberry at the Pleasantville School

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on white) Hatch poster announcing the big WLAC Radio show featuring Judy Derryberry and Little Willie with Forrest Rye at the Pleasantville School on September 6. Poster features a metal photoplate of Judy Derrryberry.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
